help.question: How do I add a record?
help.answer: Go to the Record option in the navigation bar, then select the subject, input the title and date, and answer the question.

help.question: How do I add a post?
help.answer: Go to the Post option in the navigation bar and click 'Add a new post'. You can comment on other people's posts well!

help.question: How do I add a post?
help.answer: Go to the Forum option in the navigation bar and click 'Add a new post'. You can comment on other people's posts well!

help.question: Where can I see my records
help.answer: Your records can all be seen in the Profile section, which you can access through the Profile tab of the navigation bar above.

help.question: What is the forum used for?
help.answer: The forum allows you, the user, to interact with others and gain insight from personal experiences. You can also things that you've learned!
